name: Stockade Brigade (reverse-co-op Arcade)
description:
haha, I forgot to show the controls in game (game jam game), here they are:

Player 1:        A and D to rotate, Space to shoot

Player 2:        Left Arrow and Right Arrow to rotate,  Ctrl to shoot.

I should probably explain this game too...

both players can rotate, but they both take turns rotating both players. Each turn is 2 seconds long and you can steal the next turn if the other player isn't fast enough. 

Player 1 can only kill the enemies that are his color and can  only be killed by those same enemies. Player 2  is the same way, only kill their color and be killed by that color.

You win when the other player dies when they are hit by an enemy, so fight for control and turn the other player into and enemy and stuff... and that's it!

This is literally my first game I've ever made so don't judge (unless that's your job)

Btw: I couldn't figure out how to display the winner in game so you have to figure it out urself, sorry. haha. I'm going sleep, finally.
